description: Calculates the Dice coefficient between two volumes on a slice-by-slice basis.

out_domain.title: Output domain flag
out_domain.description: Specify which slices to include in the Dice coefficient report. Options are: all (default), AorB, AandB, Amask, Bmask.

no_cmd_echo.title: No command echo flag
no_cmd_echo.description: Turn OFF recording the command line call in the output *.1D files. Default is to do the recording.
